hadiths.text: It was narrated from Ibn Abbas that:a virgin girl came to the Prophet and told him that her father arranged a marriage that she did not like, and the Prophet gave her the choice

chapter.ara-name: باب مَنْ زَوَّجَ ابْنَتَهُ وَهِيَ كَارِهَةٌ
chapter.eng-name: One who arranges his daughter’s marriage when she is unwilling
